Name: amd
Overview: Automated Music Downloader :: AMD is a Lidarr Companion script to automatically download and tag music files for use in various media applications

enableautomaticscriptstart.Name: Enable Automatic Script Start
enableautomaticscriptstart.Description: true = Enabled :: Runs script automatically on startup

scriptinterval.Name: Script Interval
scriptinterval.Description: #s or #m or #h or #d :: s = seconds, m = minutes, h = hours, d = days :: Amount of time between each script run, when AUTOSTART is enabled

lidarrurl.Name: Lidarr Url
lidarrurl.Description: Set domain or IP to your Lidarr instance including port. If using reverse proxy, do not use a trailing slash. Ensure you specify http/s.

lidarrremotepathmapping.Name: Lidarr Remote Path Mapping
lidarrremotepathmapping.Description: OPTIONAL :: ADVANCED FEATURE :: Configure this to the local volume path for Lidarr to see the downloads folder, this will enable file moves, instead of copies... Less resource intensive

musicdownloadclientarltoken.Name: Music Download Client ARL Token
musicdownloadclientarltoken.Description: User token for dl client, for instructions to obtain token: https://notabug.org/RemixDevs/DeezloaderRemix/wiki/Login+via+userToken

musicdownloadmode.Name: Music Download Mode
musicdownloadmode.Description: wanted or artist :: wanted mode only download missing/cutoff :: artist mode downloads all albums by an artist (requires lidarr volume mapping root media folders for import)

musicalbumtypefilter.Name: Music Album Type Filter
musicalbumtypefilter.Description: Filter Types: COMPILE, SINGLE, ALBUM, EP (this is a ', ' separated list of Album Types to skip) (artist mode only)

musiclisttype.Name: Music List Type
musiclisttype.Description: both or missing or cutoff :: both = missing + cutoff :: missng = lidarr missing list :: cutoff = lidarr cutoff li

musicsearchtype.Name: Music Search Type
musicsearchtype.Description: both or artist or fuzzy :: both = artist + fuzzy searching :: artist = only artist searching :: fuzzy = only fuzzy searching (Various Artist is always fuzzy searched, regardless of setting)

musicpostprocessthreads.Name: Music Post Process Threads
musicpostprocessthreads.Description: Controls number of threads used for Format conversion and replaygain tagging

musicembeddedcoverquality.Name: Music Embedded Cover Quality
musicembeddedcoverquality.Description: Controls the quality of the cover image compression in percentage, 100 = no compression

musicdownloadformat.Name: Music Download Format
musicdownloadformat.Description: FLAC or MP3 or OPUS or AAC or ALAC

musicdownloadbitrate.Name: Music Download Bitrate
musicdownloadbitrate.Description: FLAC -> OPUS/AAC/MP3 will be converted using this bitrate (MP3 320/128 is native, not converted)

musicforceconvert.Name: Music Force Convert
musicforceconvert.Description: true = enabled :: This will convert lossy MP3 to desired target format (exluding FLAC/ALAC, ALAC setting will convert to AAC)

musicrequirequality.Name: Music Require Quality
musicrequirequality.Description: true = enabled :: Requires all downloaded files match target file extension (mp3 or flac) when enabled

musicreplaygaintagging.Name: Music Replaygain Tagging
musicreplaygaintagging.Description: true = enabled :: true = enabled :: Scans and analyzes files to add replaygain tags to song metadata

musicmatchdistance.Name: Music Match Distance
musicmatchdistance.Description: Set as an integer, the higher the number, the more lienet it is. Example: A match score of 0 is a perfect match :: For more information, this score is produced using this function: https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Algorithm_Implementation/Strings/Levenshtein_distance

musicbrainzmirrorurl.Name: Musicbrainz Mirror URL
musicbrainzmirrorurl.Description: OPTIONAL: Only change if using a different mirror

musicbrainzratelimit.Name: Musicbrainz Rate Limit
musicbrainzratelimit.Description: OPTIONAL: musicbrainz rate limit, musicbrainz allows only 1 connection per second, max setting is 10 :: Set to 101 to disable limit

plexscannotifications.Name: Plex Scan Notifications
plexscannotifications.Description: true = enabled :: Plex must have a Music library added and also be configured with the /downloads-ama directory

plexlibraryname.Name: Plex Library Name
plexlibraryname.Description: This must exactly match the name of the Plex Library that contains the Lidarr Media Folder data

plexurl.Name: Plex Url
plexurl.Description: ONLY used if NOTIFYPLEX is enabled...

plextoken.Name: Plex Token
plextoken.Description: ONLY used if NOTIFYPLEX is enabled...

hostpathfordownloads-amd.Name: Host Path for /downloads-amd
hostpathfordownloads-amd.Description: Container Path: /downloads-amd (DO NOT DELETE) :: !!!!IMPORTANT!!! Map this exact volume mount to your Lidarr Container for everything to work properly!!!
